name: Soul Surfer
summary:
Got a need to hang ten but can't make it to Bonzai Beach this weekend? SEGA can help you get your fix with Soul Surfer! The only thing missing is the taste of salt water in your mouth and sand in your swim trunks!

Soul Surfer takes you to the world's greatest waves! Surf the legendary beaches of California, Polynesia, Japan, Hawaii, South Africa, Europe, and Australia!
